author: awiner
msg: ADFFACES-346:  JSF 1.2: "validator" attribute use results in ELException instead of proper FacesMessage

In wrappers that go from ValueBinding to ValueExpression or vice versa, or MethodBinding to MethodExpression or vice versa, you need to throw the proper one of EvaluationException or ELException, so unwrap and convert exceptions as needed.
